mapper.select: SELECT retail_sku.id,inventory_count,spu_status from retail_sku LEFT JOIN retail_inventory ON retail_sku.spu_id= retail_inventory.spu_id LEFT JOIN retail_spu ON retail_sku.spu_id= retail_spu.id where retail_sku.id=#{id}

SELECT *,retail_sku.id as sku_id,retail_classified.name as classifiedName from retail_sku LEFT JOIN retail_inventory ON retail_sku.spu_id= retail_inventory.spu_id LEFT JOIN retail_spu ON retail_sku.spu_id= retail_spu.id LEFT JOIN retail_brand ON retail_sku.brand_id= retail_brand.id LEFT JOIN retail_classified ON retail_sku.classified_id= retail_classified.id
where retail_sku.id=#{id}
